name: !price
description: Deprecated command
additional: Maybe in the future again...

name: !wiki
description: Searches wiki pages from <https://oldschool.runescape.wiki> with given keyword.

name: !cipher
description: Gives the solution for given cipher, including image of possible puzzle.

name: !puzzle
description: Gives an image of corresponding solved puzzle
additional: Available keywords are zulrah, snake, cerberus , gnome, gnome child, troll, tree and castle.

name: !stats
description: Gets user highscores from Old school Runesape website
additional: Supports using prefixes iron, uim, dmm, season, tournament and hc to get dofferent highscore ranks
example: `!stats might knigh` or `!ironstats might knight` or `!tournamentstats b0aty`

name: !ttm
description: Gets the needed amount of EHP (Efficient Hours Played) for given user from Crystalmathlabs
additional: User needs to be tracked and updated at least once in CML

name: !anagram
description: Gives the solution for given anagram
additional: Also supports only partly written anagrams

name: !cryptic
description: Gives the solution for given cryptic clue
additional: Also supports only partly written searches

name: !keys
description: Gives all given keywords for an item. Search supports items original names only.

name: !howlong
description: Gets the command user's Discord registering date, server joining date, and the highest role in the server

name: !xp
description: Shows how much you need xp for given level
additional: Also supports level gaps. Maximum level can be given as `max` instead of 120.

name: !calc
description: Basic pocket calculator which supports sum, subtraction, product and division
additional: Does not support more than two factors, brackets, variables or trigonometric functions

name: !ehp
description: Gives a xp/h rate which corresponds one EHP in a hour. Supports skill's original names only.
additional: Prefixes `iron`, `skiller` or `f2p` can be given to get different lists.

name: !maps
description: Gives a link into Osrs wiki clue maps site

name: !limit
description: Checks if there is any four hour buy limit for given item. Supports keywords.

name: !server commands
description: Gives a list of all custom commands set for this server.

name: %addkey
description: Adds the given keywords for given item. Supports items original names only.
additional: Supports adding multiple keywords at once. Separate the item name and all keywords with commas.

name: `%delkey`
description: Deletes the given keywords from given item. Supports items original names only.
additional: Supports deleting multiple keywords at once. Separate the item name and all keywords with commas.

name: %addcom
description: Adds the given command for server. The message of command must be inside quotation marks.
additional: Supports line breaks, which can be done with `\n`

name: %delcom
description: Deletes the given command from server. Needs only the name of the command.

name: !gains
description: Calculates the changes in user's highscores after the last check.
additional: User needs to be tracked to operate the command

name: !pricechange
description: Deprecated command
additional: Maybe in the future again...

name: !track
description: Sets the username to be tracked
additional: Type of the user registers only after all the reactions are loaded.

name: !commands
description: Prints a list of all available commands.

name: &language
description: Changes the language in which the bot answers for users commands. Only options are finnish and english.
additional: Doesnt change any server settings. Changes language only for the user executing this command.

name: !namechange
description: Changes the saved name of a tracked player to a new one. Use this every time you change your in game name.
additional: Guarantees the !gains command to work properly, hence is important to use.

name: &permit
description: Gives a role permission to use high permission commands. Only the server owner can use this command.
additional: Does not touch any Discord server options. Only applies to bot commands.

name: &unpermit
description: Removes a permission from role to use high permission commands. Only the server owner can use this command.
additional: Does not touch any Discord server options. Only applies to bot commands.

name: &add commands
description: Sets the usage of %addcom on or off. Default setting is `on`.
additional: Only the server owner can use this command

name: &settings
description: Gives all the current settings for this server.

name: !update
description: Gives a link to the latest article in Old scool Runescape website

name: %editcom
description: Edits a command that already exists for this server. The new message has to be inside quotation marks.
additional: Supports using line breaks with `\n`
example: `%editcom hello world "This is the new message."`

name: &forcelang
description: Sets a forced language in a server. When its set bot wont answer with any other language for people. The default setting is off.
additional: Only the server owner can use this command.

name: &defaultlang
description: Sets a default language in which the bot answers for users in a server when they join. Users can change this later themselves. The default setting is off.
additional: Onmly the server owner can use this command.

name: !sub streams
description: Gives a role Streams for user (if it exists and bot can manage roles). All users with this role gets a mention when someone of streamers in streamers list goes online.
additional: The streamer must have connected their Twitch account with discord. Streamer mode must also be visible for everyone so bot can detect this.

name: !unsub streams
description: Deletes the role Streams from user (if the bot can manage roles). After this thge user wont get any mentions when streamers from streamers list go online..

name: !streamers
description: Gives a list of streamers added to this server. Bot gives a mention for Streams role when any of these streamers go online.

name: !help
description: Gives a short list of bots basic commands to get help and information.
additional: Added this as a joke because some guys were spamming !help !help :joy:

name: !loot
description: Calculates a probability for getting an item with given droprate.
additional: Droprate and the number of tries must be separated with comma. Also supports droprates saved in file, when the search must be in the form of `!loot target, itemname, tries`. Only the target is necessary parameter, others just makes it more specific.
example: `!loot 1/5000, 120` **;** `!loot corporeal beast` **;** `!loot corporeal beast, 500` **;** `!loot corporeal beast, elysian sigil, 500`

name: %addloot
description: Saves a droprate for a given item into a file.
additional: If the drop goes for a specific monster/thing, give the target name first and then the itemname. Separate the names and droprate with commas..

name: %delloot
description: Removes a given droprate from file.
additional: If you want to remove a specific droprate, give the target name first and then the itemname. Separate these with commas.

name: !test
description: Tests the connection to given api.
additional: Give also the api you want to test. Current choices are wiki, osrs and cml.

name: §id
description: Gives the id of the given item.

name: §addpuzzle
description: Adds a puzzle for given anagram answer.
additional: Give the whole anagram and separate it from the puzzle name with a comma.

name: §addobject
description: Adds an item into Tradeables.json
additional: Separate the itemname and the id with a comma. This command doesn't accept high alch values!

name: §delobject
description: Deletes an item from Tradeables.json
additional: Command needs only the itemname to delete it

name: §addstream
description: Adds a streamer into server's streamers list. Needs a link to the stream and the user id.
additional: Give the link to a stream first and then the id.

name: §delstream
description: Deletes the given streamer from server's streamers list.
additional: This command needs only the user id to proceed.

name: §addlim
description: Adds a four hours buylimit for an item.
additional: Give only the itemname and buylimit, separated by comma.

name: §dellim
description: Deletes a buylimit from an item.
additional: Only the itemname is needed to proceed.

name: §addobjects
description: Add any amount of items into Tradeables.json at once.
additional: The new items must be in format ["Item1, id1", "Item2, id2", ...]. The easiest way is to use script New_items.py which gives you the right format automatically.

name: §check
description: Checks if there are any new tradeables to add to the Tradeables.json.
additional: Send a file `names.json` and send a message `§check` along with it. This is the preferred way to check new tradeables.

name: §get
description: Get a bot file from the bot directory. **This is sent to the discord chat you use this command so use carefully!**
additional: The file name and extension must be exactly same as in the file name.
